name: DailyMobileAppNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Digital Pratik brings you new mobile app news daily which will help you in making your iPhone more productive.

Enjoy the briefing...!!!

With this handy flash briefing skill your Daily Mobile App News is never far away. You can now fully operate your very own Mobile App News Updates right from your Alexa device.

... and more, simply enable this flash briefing skill and edit your order to have this on the first place and say: “Alexa, what's in the news” and make your selection from there. It’s bigger on the inside!

Your positive feedback = more development of this skill. Thanks in advance!
